verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] to decide by May 12 whether to extend sanctions waiver on Iran .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has to [V: decide] [ARGM-TMP: by May 12] [ARG1: whether to extend sanctions waiver on Iran] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has to decide by May 12 whether to [V: extend] [ARG1: sanctions waiver on Iran] .
